Name: British Museum

Name: Tower of London

Name: Stonehenge

Name: Buckingham Palace
Description: The London residence and administrative headquarters of the monarch of the United Kingdom.

Name: Edinburgh Castle
Description: A historic fortress which dominates the skyline of Edinburgh.

Name: Lake District National Park

Name: The Roman Baths

Name: Hyde Park

Description: A zoological garden in the city of Bristol, England.

Name: Ben Nevis Visitor Centre
Description: The highest mountain in the British Isles, located in Scotland.

Name: Royal Botanic Gardens
Description: A botanical garden in southwest London that houses the largest and most diverse botanical and mycological collections in the world.

Name: Coventry Cathedral

Name: Stirling Castle
Description: One of the largest and most important castles in Scotland.
